articles.title: First plants on moon, China says it has done the job - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pictures sent back January 12 showed plant shoots growing well nine days after the experiment was initiated, Chongqing University, which led the biological project, said in a briefing .
articles.content:
Chinese scientists say they have grown the first plants on the moon as part of the countrys lunar mission.
Pictures sent back Jan. 12 showed plant shoots growing well nine days after the experiment … [+1428 chars]

articles.title: China to set up world’s highest altitude telescopes in Tibet - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The telescope, located 5,250 meters above sea level, will detect and gather precise data on primordial gravitational waves in the Northern Hemisphere.
